meanings.definition: Of or relating to a paragraph.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked us to focus on the paragraphic structure of our essays.
meanings.sent2: The book had a clear and organized paragraphic layout.
meanings.sent3: I find it amusing how the paragraphic rules can vary between different writing styles.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a well-structured paragraphic masterpiece, each point flowing seamlessly into the next.
meanings.sent5: The paragraphic format of the document made it easy to follow and understand.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or characterized by paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: The article was a paragraphic summary of the research findings.
meanings.sent2: The report was well-written with a paragraphic approach to presenting the information.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how the paragraphic organization of the text made it easier to read.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked like a paragraphic arrangement of buildings against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The paragraphic structure of the novel helped break down the story into manageable sections.
